functions.name: process_and_compress
functions.description: Compresses a directory containing processed files into a zip archive for easy download.

parameters.directory_path: Path to the directory containing files to compress.
parameters.target_dir: Target directory to store the compressed archive. Defaults to '/mnt/data/result'.
parameters.archive_format: Format of the archive. Defaults to 'zip'.

functions.returns: Path to the compressed archive file.

functions.name: save_data_persistently
functions.description: Saves data to a JSON file periodically and immediately upon change.

parameters.file_path: Path to the JSON file where data will be saved. Defaults to '/mnt/data/persistent_data.json'.
parameters.interval: Time interval (in seconds) between periodic saves. Defaults to 600.
